name: CALL: Reset
description:
Welcome to the Town of Danton

THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY STILL BEING DEVELOPED

CALL: Reset is a short game in which the player is thrown into the new, trendy internet in the 90's. See what's happening on the forums! Maybe there's an event happening at the park today?

The internet is a fun place for everyone. Who knows what types of people you'll run across?

Yes, on the internet, everyone is welcome! 

This game is not yet complete. Currently both Act 1 and 2 are fully playable while the final act is still receiving updates and story content. Completion time is roughly 30-35 minutes. The game is fully playable for free from this page with the option to buy the pocket file itself for 1$.
